0.1: Quelle pitié notre provincial ne va-t-il pas inspirer aux jeunes lycéens de Paris qui, à quinze ans, savent déjà entrer dans un café d’un air si distingué ? Mais ces enfants, si bien stylés à quinze ans, à dix-huit tournent au commun. La timidité passionnée que l’on rencontre en province se surmonte quelquefois et alors elle enseigne à vouloir. En s’approchant de cette jeune fille si belle, qui daignait lui adresser la parole, il faut que je lui dise la vérité, pensa Julien, qui devenait courageux à force de timidité vaincue.
0.2: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful. Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain, but because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure. To take a trivial example, which of us ever undertakes laborious physical exercise, except to obtain some advantage from it? But who has any right to find fault with a man who chooses to enjoy a pleasure that has no annoying consequences, or one who avoids a pain that produces no resultant pleasure? On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee

2.0: In a world where the sun rises over the horizon, casting golden rays upon the dew-kissed grass, the gentle breeze whispers secrets of the day to come. Birds chirp melodiously, creating a symphony of nature that awakens the soul. As the clock ticks, the promise of adventure lingers in the air, inviting all to step outside and embrace the beauty that surrounds them.
2.1: Amidst the bustling city streets, where skyscrapers touch the clouds and the hum of life fills the atmosphere, a lone traveler wanders in search of inspiration. Each corner turned reveals a new story, a hidden gem waiting to be discovered. The aroma of freshly brewed coffee wafts through the air, beckoning passersby to pause and savor the moment, if only for a heartbeat.
2.2: Deep within the enchanted forest, where ancient trees stand tall and the air is thick with magic, a hidden path leads to a realm of wonder. Sunlight filters through the leaves, creating a dance of shadows on the forest floor. Here, time stands still, and the worries of the outside world fade away, leaving only the tranquility of nature and the promise of new beginnings.
